Texts.Chs: 太棒了！我想现在这样就够了。将来你可以和我说话或者使用一个orange;三度仪^resset;来调整(或者研究)技术！
Texts.Eng: Most excellent! I think that about does the trick for now. In the future you can speak to me or use a ^orange;Tricorder^reset; to adjust (or research) Techs!

Texts.Chs: 也许你想要我^orange;升级^reset;你的变形球？ 升级之后你可以通过按^red;[开火键]^reset;投掷炸弹并炸掉东西！我需要一些最后的组件来完成它。你能给我带来10个^orange;金锭^reset;吗？
Texts.Eng: Perhaps you'd like me to ^orange;upgrade^reset; your Distortion Sphere? It will allow you to drop bombs by pressing ^red;[Fire]^reset; to blow things up! I need some final components to finish it. ^green;Could you bring me 10 ^orange;Gold Bars^reset;?
